title: Production Smaz Tier List
description: This list ranks Smazs based on their skills for improving camp resource generation and overall efficiency.

entries.name: Baboom
entries.simple_explanation: Doubles the lumber output of all Table Saws in your camp.
entries.complex_explanation: Baboom's 'Nature's Gift' skill provides a massive 100% boost to Lumber output from ALL Table Saws in the camp. This is a global, game-changing bonus for a critical resource, making it arguably the best production Smaz.
entries.synergies: The cornerstone of your wood economy. The more Table Saws you have, the more powerful this skill becomes.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Nature's Gift (+100% Lumber output from all Table Saws)

entries.name: Vulcanid
entries.simple_explanation: Doubles the steel output of all Furnaces in your camp.
entries.complex_explanation: Similar to Baboom, Vulcanid's 'Tempered Steel' skill doubles the Steel output of all Furnaces camp-wide. Given the importance of Steel, this global 100% bonus is incredibly powerful and essential for late-game progression.
entries.synergies: The foundation of your steel economy. This Smaz is a must-have for efficient resource production.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Tempered Steel (+100% Steel output from all Furnaces)

entries.name: Maximito
entries.simple_explanation: Massively reduces construction time for buildings.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Big Little Builder' reduces total construction time by a flat 64 minutes (up to 94 minutes with ascension). This is an enormous time-save for camp upgrades, saving countless speedups and accelerating progression significantly.
entries.synergies: Invaluable for any player looking to upgrade their camp quickly. Its value diminishes once all buildings are maxed out, but it's S-tier for the entire progression phase.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Big Little Builder (Reduces construction time by 64+ minutes)

entries.name: Squeezel
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a large boost to Gold generation in the Shop.
entries.complex_explanation: Squeezel's 'Full Tilt' skill increases Gold output in a Shop by 60%. While it also has mining skills, this specialized Gold generation skill is its main draw, providing a substantial boost to your income.
entries.synergies: The best Smaz to station in your Shop for passive Gold income.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Full Tilt (+60% Gold output in Shop)

entries.name: Terrastudo
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a large boost to Ore mining.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Drill Shell' increases Ore output by 60% when working a Mining job. This is a very strong, specialized bonus for a key base material.
entries.synergies: The best specialist for your mining stations.

entries.name: Keranosaur
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a large boost to Electricity generation.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Ionized' increases Electricity output by 60% when working a Charging job. Essential for powering your advanced camp facilities.
entries.synergies: The premier choice for your Power Plant.

entries.name: Herculeaf
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a solid 35% boost to Lumber.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Bear-y Strong' provides a +35% Lumber output bonus. While dwarfed by Baboom's global bonus, it's still a very strong skill and a great choice to station at a Table Saw if you don't have Baboom.
entries.synergies: A good secondary lumberjack or a primary one before you acquire Baboom.

entries.name: Emboa
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a solid 35% boost to Steel.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Recycling' gives a +35% Steel output bonus. Like Herculeaf, it's a strong specialist bonus that is outclassed by Vulcanid's global buff but is still highly valuable.
entries.synergies: A good secondary smelter or a primary one before you acquire Vulcanid.

entries.name: Bruiseberry
entries.complex_explanation: 'Tireless' provides a +60% training speed boost when working in an Armigo Hut. This is excellent for quickly leveling up your troops.
entries.synergies: The best Smaz to have stationed in your training grounds.

entries.name: Lendanear
entries.simple_explanation: Speeds up Smaz healing in the Hospital.
entries.complex_explanation: 'TenderCare' provides a +27% healing speed boost. This is very useful for reducing the downtime of your Smazs after tough battles or failed missions.
entries.synergies: The optimal choice for your Hospital.

entries.name: Surveilynx
entries.simple_explanation: Boosts the attack of your defending Armigo and helps with training.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Elite Drills' allows for Quick Training Armigo and provides a passive +20% Attack bonus to all Armigo defending your Camp. This is a unique defensive production skill.
entries.synergies: A great passive slot for players who frequently get attacked.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Elite Drills (+20% ATK for defending Armigo)

entries.name: Incineraptor
entries.simple_explanation: Helps you get more and better intel quests.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Eagle Eye' provides extra treasure from intel quests and allows you to generate high-quality quests. This is a unique skill for meta-progression rather than direct resource generation.
entries.synergies: Useful for players focused on grinding quests for rewards.
entries.relevant_info: Skill: Eagle Eye (Generates intel quests, provides extra treasure)

entries.name: Squeezel (Mining)
entries.simple_explanation: Has two separate skills that boost ore mining by 35% each.
entries.complex_explanation: Squeezel has both 'Deft Paws' and 'Lucky Hands,' each providing a +35% Ore output. While this seems great, it's outclassed by Terrastudo's single +60% skill, and its best role is in the Shop.
entries.synergies: A decent miner if Terrastudo is unavailable.
entries.relevant_info: Skills: Deft Paws (+35% Ore), Lucky Hands (+35% Ore)

entries.name: Fluff Static
entries.simple_explanation: Provides a 35% boost to Electricity generation.
entries.complex_explanation: 'Static Fluff' provides a +35% Electricity output bonus. This is a solid skill but is significantly weaker than Keranosaur's +60% bonus.
entries.synergies: A budget option for the Power Plant.

entries.name: Lendanear (Planting)
entries.complex_explanation: 'Nature's Blessing' provides a +35% crop output. Food is generally less of a bottleneck than other resources, making this a lower-priority production skill.
entries.synergies: Good for food production if you find yourself running low.
